mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into activedata (activesStepId, isSign, sumStep, dayStep, type, status) values (#{activesstepid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{issign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sumstep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{daystep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update activedata set activesStepId = #{activesstepid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isSign = #{issign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sumStep = #{sumstep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dayStep = #{daystep,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, activesStepId, isSign, sumStep, dayStep, type, status from activedata
select id, activesStepId, isSign, sumStep, dayStep, type, status from activedata where type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status='1' order by sumStep desc limit 100
